title: Signs of God's Favor | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Signs of God's Favor | Joel Osteen
description:
When God puts a dream in your heart, He will always confirm it with signs that what He promised will come to pass. It doesn’t matter how much time has passed—His promise is still on the way. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
